verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
God of mercy
and compassion,
look with pity upon me,
Father let me call
thee father,
'tis thy child returns
to thee.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Jesus Lord,
I ask for mercy
Let me not implore in vain,
All my sins,
I now detest them,
Never, will I sin again.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
By my sins
I have deserved death
and endless misery,
hell with all its pains
and torments,
and for all eternity.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
By my sins
I have abandon'd
right and claim
to heaven above,
where the saints
rejoice forever,
in a boundless sea of love.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
See our saviour,
bleeding dying,
on the the cross of
calvary.
To that cross my sins
have nail'd him,
yet he bleeds
and dies for me.
